name: Aphelios
title: the Weapon of the Faithful
shortBio: Emerging from moonlight's shadow with weapons drawn, Aphelios kills the enemies of his faith in brooding silence—speaking only through the certainty of his aim, and the firing of each gun. Though fueled by a poison that renders him mute, he is guided by his sister Alune. From her distant temple sanctuary, she pushes an arsenal of moonstone weapons into his hands. For as long as the moon shines overhead, Aphelios will never be alone.

skins.name: Nightbringer Aphelios

chromas.name: Nightbringer Aphelios

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: Nightbringer Aphelios

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: Separated at primordial birth, Aphelios, a fiend of chaos, and Alune, an archoness of order, were created as enemies. Yet, drawn each night to wander by shared visions of the moon, they found each other. Abandoning their natures, they struggle to show creation that darkness can shine, even as other divinities endlessly war…

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Lunar Beast 2021 event.

skins.description: Aphelios stays quiet, preferring to worship the Bull God according to obscure “old ways” that are unfamiliar to the rest of his squad. His teammates are welcoming, if curious, but have yet to realize that Aphelios and his sister Alune are actually the Bull God's progeny, placed among the squad to face this year's Lunar Beast.

skins.description: Ionians share whispered stories of the twin spirits of the night, Aphelios and Alune. It is said the darkening of the sky comes from the brother's armaments, tearing the fabric of blues and whites apart to create an obsidian canvas painted with stars. The sister's motives are more... mysterious.

chromas.name: HEARTSTEEL Aphelios

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

skins.description: A multi-instrumental musical genius whose passion for his craft is nigh obsessive, Aphelios is the composer and creative backbone of HEARTSTEEL.  Though he rarely ever speaks, with this wild band of musical misfits and his twin sister (the band's manager Alune) by his side, Aphelios is ready to have his creative voice heard loud and clear.

passive.name: The Hitman and the Seer
passive.description: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

spells.name: Weapon Abilites
spells.description:
Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

spells.name: Phase
spells.description: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.
spells.dynamicDescription: Swap main-hand and off-hand weapons, equipping Gravitum.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Weapon Queue System
spells.description: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

spells.name: Moonlight Vigil
spells.description: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes when it hits a champion, dealing @MaxDamage@ physical damage to surrounding enemies.

Then, Aphelios attacks all champions hit with his main-hand weapon. {{ Spell_ApheliosR_WeaponMod_@f1@ }}@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
